feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: Embiid and Garland Dominate, Warriors and Knicks Struggles, and Most Improved Player Award Favorites - Season 2 Episode 5

link.title: Embiid and Garland Dominate, Warriors and Knicks Struggles, and Most Improved Player Award Favorites - Season 2 Episode 5

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss some impressive performances by Joel Embiid and Darius Garland, the recent struggles and what needs to change for the Warriors and Knicks, plus who they think should be the favorites for the most improved player award!

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Kyrie Irving Requirements, Nets Next Head Coach, Timberwolves Troubles, Cleveland and Utah Red Hot Start!! - Season 2 Episode 4

link.title: Kyrie Irving Requirements, Nets Next Head Coach, Timberwolves Troubles, Cleveland and Utah Red Hot Start!! - Season 2 Episode 4

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss what Kyrie Irving has to do in order to get back on the court, as well what the Minnesota Timberwolves need to do to get back on track, and what’s been the key to the Cavs and Jazz strong start to the season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: BREAKING: Nets Fire Nash, Set to Hire Udoka!!! - Season 2 Episode 3

link.title: BREAKING: Nets Fire Nash, Set to Hire Udoka!!! - Season 2 Episode 3

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the breaking news that the Brooklyn Nets fired head coach Steve Nash and are set to hire former Celtics coach Ime Udoka.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: NBA Drama, Extensions, Picks, and more! 2023 Season Preview with Lucas Jafet of Share The Rock - Season 2 Episode 1

link.title: NBA Drama, Extensions, Picks, and more! 2023 Season Preview with Lucas Jafet of Share The Rock - Season 2 Episode 1

entry.content:
THE NBA IS BACK! It’s opening night and Jack and Noah open up Season 2 of One on One alongside Lucas Jafet of the Share The Rock podcast. They discuss the Warriors drama, the recent extensions signed across the league, and make their standings, awards, and championship picks. It’s going to be a wild season of hoops, and the One on One crew gets you primed for all the action across the league.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: NBA 2023 Season Preview - Season 1 Episode 27
entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the NBA season that is fast approaching. They look at Vegas Insider win totals for NBA teams this upcoming season and discuss if they are accurate or not.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Robert Sarver Selling the Suns, Celtics Suspend Head Coach for a Year, ESPN Top 10 NBA Players for 2022, and NBA Trades and Rumors - Season 1 Episode 26

link.title: Robert Sarver Selling the Suns, Celtics Suspend Head Coach for a Year, ESPN Top 10 NBA Players for 2022, and NBA Trades and Rumors - Season 1 Episode 26

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss Robert Sarver in the process of selling the Suns, the Celtics suspending head coach Ime Udoka, ESPN top 10 players list, and discuss the latest NBA trade rumors.

entry.title: Dennis Back in LA, Draft Eligibility Rules Changing, Robert Server Fate, and ESPN Rank Reaction - Season 1 Episode 25

link.title: Dennis Back in LA, Draft Eligibility Rules Changing, Robert Server Fate, and ESPN Rank Reaction - Season 1 Episode 25

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss Dennis Schroder returning to the Lakers, the NBA changing the age of eligibility from 19 to 18, Robert Server selling or waiting out his suspension, and thoughts on ESPNs latest player rankings.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Robert Sarver Fined and Suspended, Basketball Hall of Fame Class, and Who in the League Now Will Eventually Wind Up in Springfield? - Season 1 Episode 24

link.title: Robert Sarver Fined and Suspended, Basketball Hall of Fame Class, and Who in the League Now Will Eventually Wind Up in Springfield? - Season 1 Episode 24

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the breaking news regarding Suns’ team governor Robert Sarver and the loaded 2022 Basketball Hall of Fame Class. They also debate which current NBA players will one day be inducted into the Hall, and who might just miss the cut.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: Donovan Mitchell Traded to Cleveland, How It Affects the Eastern Conference; Montrezl Harrell Signs With Philly, What That Mean for the 76ers - Season 1 Episode 23

link.title: Donovan Mitchell Traded to Cleveland, How It Affects the Eastern Conference; Montrezl Harrell Signs With Philly, What That Mean for the 76ers - Season 1 Episode 23

entry.content:
This week on One on One, Jack and Noah discuss the latest NBA blockbuster trade of Donovan Mitchell to the Cavs, they also discuss the 76ers signing of former 6th man of the year, Montrezl Harrell, and what it means for them this upcoming season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
